languages.text: Исполинские горы бумаг и бесконечные ряды полок с томами реестров вызывают в груди адептусов Администратума особое благоговение перед законами Бога-Императора.

traits.locale_text: Исполинские горы бумаг и бесконечные ряды полок с томами реестров вызывают в груди адептусов Администратума особое благоговение перед законами Бога-Императора.

languages.text: The towering piles of papers and endless shelves heaving with ledgers evoke special reverence for the laws of the God-Emperor in the hearts of the servants of the Adeptus Administratum.
languages.original_text: Исполинские горы бумаг и бесконечные ряды полок с томами реестров вызывают в груди адептусов Администратума особое благоговение перед законами Бога-Императора.

traits.locale_text: The towering piles of papers and endless shelves heaving with ledgers evoke special reverence for the laws of the God-Emperor in the hearts of the servants of the Adeptus Administratum.
The towering piles of papers and endless shelves heaving with ledgers evoke special reverence for the laws of the God-Emperor in the hearts of the servants of the Adeptus Administratum.
The towering piles of papers and endless shelves heaving with ledgers evoke special reverence for the laws of the God-Emperor in the hearts of the servants of the Adeptus Administratum.
The towering piles of papers and endless shelves heaving with ledgers evoke special reverence for the laws of the God-Emperor in the hearts of the servants of the Adeptus Administratum.

languages.text: 桌子上堆着高耸入云的文件堆，一望无际的架子上排满了记事簿。这一幕足以唤起帝国内政部任何仆人对神皇律法的敬畏之情。
languages.original_text: The towering piles of papers and endless shelves heaving with ledgers evoke special reverence for the laws of the God-Emperor in the hearts of the servants of the Adeptus Administratum.

traits.locale_text: 桌子上堆着高耸入云的文件堆，一望无际的架子上排满了记事簿。这一幕足以唤起帝国内政部任何仆人对神皇律法的敬畏之情。

languages.text: Las montañas de papeles y los estantes rebosantes de libros de contabilidad inducen una especial reverencia por las leyes del Dios Emperador en los corazones de los sirvientes del Adeptus Administratum.
languages.original_text: The towering piles of papers and endless shelves heaving with ledgers evoke special reverence for the laws of the God-Emperor in the hearts of the servants of the Adeptus Administratum.

traits.locale_text: Las montañas de papeles y los estantes rebosantes de libros de contabilidad inducen una especial reverencia por las leyes del Dios Emperador en los corazones de los sirvientes del Adeptus Administratum.

languages.text: 塔のように積み上げられた紙の山と台帳でパンパンになった円形書架は、帝国行政局の職員が中心に据えている神帝陛下の法律に対する尊敬の念を呼び起こす。
languages.original_text: The towering piles of papers and endless shelves heaving with ledgers evoke special reverence for the laws of the God-Emperor in the hearts of the servants of the Adeptus Administratum.

traits.locale_text: 塔のように積み上げられた紙の山と台帳でパンパンになった円形書架は、帝国行政局の職員が中心に据えている神帝陛下の法律に対する尊敬の念を呼び起こす。

languages.text: Les immenses piles de documents et les rayonnages interminables croulant sous les registres témoignent de la profonde révérence des fonctionnaires de l'Adeptus Administratum envers les lois de l'Empereur-Dieu.
languages.original_text: The towering piles of papers and endless shelves heaving with ledgers evoke special reverence for the laws of the God-Emperor in the hearts of the servants of the Adeptus Administratum.

traits.locale_text: Les immenses piles de documents et les rayonnages interminables croulant sous les registres témoignent de la profonde révérence des fonctionnaires de l'Adeptus Administratum envers les lois de l'Empereur-Dieu.

languages.text: Die turmhohen Papierstapel und endlosen Regale voller Folianten erwecken in den Herzen der Diener des Adeptus Administratum eine besondere Ehrfurcht vor den Gesetzen des Gottimperators.
languages.original_text: The towering piles of papers and endless shelves heaving with ledgers evoke special reverence for the laws of the God-Emperor in the hearts of the servants of the Adeptus Administratum.

traits.locale_text: Die turmhohen Papierstapel und endlosen Regale voller Folianten erwecken in den Herzen der Diener des Adeptus Administratum eine besondere Ehrfurcht vor den Gesetzen des Gottimperators.

languages.text: Yükseklere uzanan kâğıt yığınlarıyla sonu gelmezcesine raflara dizilmiş büyük defterler, Adeptus Administratum hizmetkârlarının kalplerinde Tanrı İmparator'un kanunlarına karşı özel bir hürmet uyandırır.
languages.original_text: The towering piles of papers and endless shelves heaving with ledgers evoke special reverence for the laws of the God-Emperor in the hearts of the servants of the Adeptus Administratum.

traits.locale_text: Yükseklere uzanan kâğıt yığınlarıyla sonu gelmezcesine raflara dizilmiş büyük defterler, Adeptus Administratum hizmetkârlarının kalplerinde Tanrı İmparator'un kanunlarına karşı özel bir hürmet uyandırır.
